title: Renovated Lincoln Square 2BD apt w/ In unit Laundry - Steps from Brown
posting_body: Live in beautiful Lincoln Square, just a quick walk to the Montrose Brown line!
The Brown line can take you to Albany Park, Lakeview, Lincoln Park and the Loop.
Right next to the Square which has a ton of restaurants, shops, and night life.
Garcia's, Sushi Tokoro, Le Cafe, Fork, and The Sixth are just some of the must try spots in this area.
The chopping block, Lincoln Square Athletic Club, Davis Theater, and Welles Park are all within walking distance as well.
Wells park offers sports fields, an indoor pool, playground, a fitness center, and a concert stage.
This fully renovated two bedroom unit features one bath, granite counter-tops, stainless steel appliances, updated features including a dishwasher, and laundry in the unit.
This building is pet friendly, has no security deposit, and wont last long!
Call today to set up your showing!
